thumb.name: Wishes for Relative
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EKnow what%3Cbr%3EI'm wishing%3Cbr%3Efor Christmas%3Cbr%3Ethis year.%3Cbr%3EStephanie?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...that everyone%3Cbr%3Ein the whole wide world%3Cbr%3Ecould have a relative%3Cbr%3Eas nice as you!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas%3Cbr%3Efrom My Heart to Yours%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Forever Friend
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas%3Cbr%3Eto Michelle.%3Cbr%3EMy 'Forever Friend'%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're not just%3Cbr%3Ea friend for today %26#151;%3Cbr%3Eyou're a friend for life.%3Cbr%3Eand that's why%3Cbr%3EI'm wishing you%3Cbr%3Ea Christmas filled with%3Cbr%3Eenough 'merry'%3Cbr%3Eto last a lifetime!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: To a Dear Relative
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETo a Dear Relative%3Cbr%3Ewith Love from Richard%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor all the thoughtful%3Cbr%3Ethings you've done%3Cbr%3Eand all the happiness%3Cbr%3Eyou've given.%3Cbr%3Ethis card comes%3Cbr%3Ewith a heart full of gratitude%3Cbr%3Eand wishes for a%3Cbr%3Every merry Christmas.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas. John.%3Cbr%3Eand Happy New Year%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Magic of Friends
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJennifer.%3Cbr%3Eit's not the trees or tinsel%3Cbr%3Ethat make the season special...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's gentle friends like you%3Cbr%3Ewho bring a certain sparkle%3Cbr%3Eto the holidays.%3Cbr%3EFor in the warmth%3Cbr%3Eof your bright spirit.%3Cbr%3Ethe magic of Christmas%3Cbr%3Eis something real and true!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMERRY CHRISTMAS%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Christmas Wishes
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor the Peterson Family%3Cbr%3Eat the Holidays%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAs you enjoy%3Cbr%3Ethe many gifts%3Cbr%3Ethat Christmas%3Cbr%3Ebrings your way %26#151;%3Cbr%3EThe smiles and joys%3Cbr%3Eand family times%3Cbr%3Eyou'll share%3Cbr%3Ethis holiday...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EPlease know that you're%3Cbr%3Eremembered%3Cbr%3Eby those who lives%3Cbr%3Eyou touch...%3Cbr%3EAnd wished a world%3Cbr%3Eof happiness %26#151;%3Cbr%3Ebecause you mean%3Cbr%3Eso much.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Across the Miles Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You. Dana. From Across the Miles%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Ci%3EThe Petersons%3C/i%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThough nothing ever takes the place%3Cbr%3EOf greetings spoken face to face.%3Cbr%3EStill. thoughts must sometimes cross the miles%3Cbr%3EAnd take the place of words and smiles...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESo. on this Christmas holiday.%3Cbr%3EThis card brings warmest thoughts your way.%3Cbr%3EBesides a little wish or two%3Cbr%3EThat things are going well for you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMERRY CHRISTMAS%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Holy Night
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESomewhere%3Cbr%3Ein the flurry%3Cbr%3Eof the season.%3Cbr%3Emay we find time%3Cbr%3Eto dream%3Cbr%3Eabout that blessed%3Cbr%3Eholy night%3Cbr%3Ethat changed%3Cbr%3Ethe world...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETime to give thanks%3Cbr%3Ewith all our hearts%3Cbr%3Ethat God so loved the world.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Hope of Christ
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You.%3Cbr%3EDana %26 Joe%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe snow%3Cbr%3Efalls soft%3Cbr%3Eupon the night.%3Cbr%3EReflecting%3Cbr%3EChristmas%3Cbr%3Ejoy and light.%3Cbr%3EThe stars%3Cbr%3Elook down%3Cbr%3Eupon the earth.%3Cbr%3ERemembering%3Cbr%3Ethe Christ Child's%3Cbr%3Ebirth.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay the hope that was born%3Cbr%3Ethat silent. holy night%3Cbr%3Eremain in your heart%3Cbr%3Ethroughout the year.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Celebrate the Season
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Holdiays%3Cbr%3Efrom the%3Cbr%3ESmith Family%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay you celebrate%3Cbr%3Ethis beautiful season%3Cbr%3Ewith joy in your home.%3Cbr%3Epeace in your world.%3Cbr%3Eand love in your heart!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Jolly Santa
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHo!%3Cbr%3EHo!%3Cbr%3EHo!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou'd be jolly. too.%3Cbr%3Eif you only had to work%3Cbr%3Eone day a year!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas%3Cbr%3E
